## gcloud.CloudRunProps.serviceName property

Name of the Cloud Run service in gcloud

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
serviceName?: string;
```

## Remarks

This is the absolute name of the service to use. If not specified Adapt will automatically generate a name for the service.
